Tap here to add at a theme!: Kha vha puṱedze hafha u ḓadza thero!
I'll show you an example - tap the Natur: Ndi ḓo vha sumbedza tsumbo - kha vha puṱedze thero ya Mupo.
You can choose a start date and end date: Vha nga nanga ḓuvha ḽa u thoma na ḓuvha ḽa u fhedza u itela thero iyi.
You can choose a language for this theme: Vha nga nanga luambo lwa iyi thero. Ndi ḓo vha sumbedza dzinyito nga ulwu luambo arali dzi hone.
Great! I have planned all your activitie: Khezwo! Ndo vha pulanela dzinyito dzavho dzoṱhe! Kha vha puṱedze kha nyito u vhona zwidodombedzwa..
See the activity details here. You're al: Kha vha vhone zwidodombedzwa zwa nyito hafha. Vho fhedza nga ha u ḓadza thero!
If you don't want to use a theme, you ca: Arali vha sa ṱoḓi u shumisa thero, vha nga puṱedza hafha u nanga nyito!
Tap the box to choose the activity: Kha vha puṱedze bogisi u nanga nyito.
Great! Now the activity is selected. Whe: Kuhle kakhulu! Manje umsebenzi usukhethiwe. Uma usufuna ukufunda kabanzi ngomsebenzi, ungathinta lesi sithonjana.
